summary: This file defines a Vue component named AwardItem, which is used to display information about an award, including its title, issuer, role, description, and date.
functionality: The AwardItem component takes in several props (title, issuer, role, description, date) and displays them in a structured format. It also includes a styled date section with a calendar icon.
relationships: This component is likely used within a larger awards section or list in the project, possibly in a file like AwardsList.vue or AwardsSection.vue.
It may be part of a larger user profile or achievements section, where various awards are listed.

identified_relationships.description: AwardItem.vue is likely referenced by AwardList.vue to display multiple award items.
AwardItem.vue may reference the awards store to fetch or display award data.
AwardItem.vue might import a CSS file to style the award item component.
AwardItem.vue could import a utility function to format the date of the award.
